sentences.en: And a pound of mince, too.
Brown the mince in a frying pan.
sentences.cn: 在煎锅里把肉末煎至棕色。

sentences.en: Don't mince matters , but speak plainly.
sentences.cn: 不要含糊其词, 有话就直说吧.

sentences.en: Favorite desserts include mince pie or pumpkin pie, plum pudding and fruitcake.
sentences.cn: 人们最喜欢的饭后甜点包括甜馅饼或南瓜馅饼 、 李子布丁和水果蛋糕.

sentences.en: He does not mince matters [ his words ] .
I didn't mince matters: I said he was an idiot.
sentences.cn: 我不讳言,我说过他是白疑.

sentences.en: Mince the meat and the onion.
Mince the meat up with some onion and garlic.
sentences.cn: 把肉和些许洋葱、大蒜混合在一起剁碎。

sentences.en: Perhaps I'll buy lean meat and mince it myself.
sentences.cn: 也许我会买点瘦肉自己绞。

sentences.en: She had a hot mince pie for him.
sentences.cn: 她给他做了热碎肉馅饼.

sentences.en: The doctors didn't mince their words, and predicted the worst.
sentences.cn: 医生直言相告，并做了最坏的预测。

sentences.en: Wash beef, pat dry and mince. Stir in seasoning gradually until well - mixed.
sentences.cn: 牛肉洗净, 抹乾,剁烂,慢慢拌入调味料至均匀.

sentences.en: Wash cattlefish, wipe dry and mince then in a meat grinder.
sentences.cn: 墨鱼肉洗净, 抹乾水切碎,放入碎肉机内搅烂.

sentences.en: Wash, dry and mince pork. Stir in soy sauce and white pepper.
sentences.cn: 猪肉洗净沥乾,切碎, 并加入豉油及胡椒粉腌好.

sentences.en: Workers were very busy with stuffing special pork mince paste into tofu.
sentences.cn: 有人忙煎,有人忙将肉酱塞进豆腐内.

sentences.en: Would you like me to mince the meat for you?
sentences.cn: 你要我替你把肉切碎 吗 ?

words.tran_cn: 碎肉器（等于mincing machine）；说话吞吐的人

phrases.tran_cn: (旧)[表不满]吞吞吐吐，含糊其辞

trans.tran_en: meat, especially  beef  , that has been cut into very small pieces using a special machine
to cut food, especially meat, into very small pieces, usually using a machine
